question.text: When the next {Indirect free-kick} happens, lock onto that team. Respond 'Trigger: {Indirect free-kick} by left/right' and thereafter 'Then: <Event> by left/right' for {Shots on target, Corner, Shots off target and Indirect free-kick}. Left/right only.

answer.text: Then: Shots on target by right
Then: Shots off target by right
